channel.title: Moving castlewars portal
channel.description: anybody know how i can either move the non working castlewars sara portal to my respawn point when ppl die so wen they die they return to the spawn point but there stood in the middle of this portal?

item.title: Moving castlewars portal
item.dc:creator: @slay_blad3 slay blad3
item.description:
@slay_blad3 wrote:

As far as i know, you cant move original rs graphics. Try making a nearby object (crate or door or something) teleport or just changing respawn point lol.

Find:

if (objectID == 2879)

And add this under the last bracket of that code.

if ((objectID == ####) &&(objectX == ####) && (objectY == ####)) // ID, objectX is X coord, objectY is Y coord
		{
		teleportToX = ####;
		teleportToY = ####;
		}

Change the location of where you want to teleport to and add it in TeleportToX/Y

[[[TestScape]]]

Your Welcome.

Read full topic
